1.0.name: wordpress/hide-this-part
1.0.description: Hide parts of the content of your posts or pages by surrounding it with [hide-this-part] and [/hide-this-part] shortcode. You can even set the text of the more link (that will make hidden parts visible) by passing the parameter "morelink" like this: [hide-this-part morelink="show the rest"]. In this case the text of the more link would be "show the rest". See also the official plugin documentation.
